+ Keyboard Shortcut Ctrl-Alt-Up

Use [Ctrl-Alt-Up] in order to view the [history] window with the previous word automatically selected.

++ See also

	* [Ctrl-H], [Ctrl-Alt-Right], [Ctrl-Alt-Left], [Ctrl-Alt-Down]
	* KeyBindings


[:page:PageFooter][icon:key][alias:Ctrl-Alt-Up][short_hint:View history: select previous]
